did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Holograph manuscript, accompanied by typescript copy, concerns reminiscences of author's childhood in Tucson; chiefly describes fiestas and other entertainments.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into a chronological narrative.
